name: Cool School
description:
Challenge yourself! Learn about a wide variety of topics in a fun way! Cool School is fun and useful for people of all ages! Figure out what doesn't belong in Endless Mode and answer questions about engaging topics in Trivia Mode! Watch ads to earn Polished Apples that will have more and more uses with time!

TO PARENTS: Cool School does not and will not include in-app purchases for real money. This is out of respect for our audience and our own integrity. To make up for this, we would highly appreciate an optional donation on our SubscribeStar page at https://www.subscribestar.com/helmersoft. This is a healthy way of supporting the people and businesses that matter to you!

Cool School is in development, which means that more content will be added all the time, so make sure to come back, get the latest version, and enjoy all the new features as they come out! I hear St. Nick enjoys a polished apple or two...

Why not check out our website at http://helmersoft.epizy.com/? There, you can read about everything Cool School and Helmersoft, and find out what's in store for the next update!
